content.query:
-- Create the internal table 
CREATE TABLE dbo.heart_disease_data_internal (
    patient_state NVARCHAR(100),
    patient_gender NVARCHAR(100),
    general_health NVARCHAR(100),
    physical_health_days INT,
    mental_health_days INT,
    last_checkup_time NVARCHAR(100),
    physical_activities NVARCHAR(100),
    sleep_hours FLOAT,
    had_heart_attack NVARCHAR(100),
    had_angina NVARCHAR(100),
    had_stroke NVARCHAR(100),
    had_asthma NVARCHAR(100),
    had_skin_cancer NVARCHAR(100),
    had_copd NVARCHAR(100),
    had_depressive_disorder NVARCHAR(100),
    had_kidney_disease NVARCHAR(100),
    had_arthritis NVARCHAR(100),
    had_diabetes NVARCHAR(100),
    deaf_or_hard_of_hearing NVARCHAR(100),
    blind_or_vision_difficulty NVARCHAR(100),
    difficulty_concentrating NVARCHAR(100),
    difficulty_walking NVARCHAR(100),
    difficulty_dressing_bathing NVARCHAR(100),
    difficulty_errands NVARCHAR(100),
    smoker_status NVARCHAR(100),
    ecigarette_usage NVARCHAR(100),
    chest_scan NVARCHAR(100),
    race_ethnicity_category NVARCHAR(100),
    age_category NVARCHAR(100),
    height_in_meters FLOAT,
    weight_in_kilograms FLOAT,
    bmi FLOAT,
    alcohol_drinkers NVARCHAR(100),
    hiv_testing NVARCHAR(100),
    flu_vax_last_12 NVARCHAR(100),
    pneumo_vax_ever NVARCHAR(100),
    tetanus_last_10_tdap NVARCHAR(100),
    high_risk_last_year NVARCHAR(100),
    covid_pos NVARCHAR(100),
    ingested_data NVARCHAR(100)
)
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(patient_state) 
);
